testcase.name: basic appearance of the app
testcase.system-out: unique-id: [engine:kotest]/[spec:goos.AuctionSniperEndToEndTest]/[test:basic appearance of the app] display-name: basic appearance of the app

testcase.name: sniper joins auction, loses without bidding
testcase.system-out: unique-id: [engine:kotest]/[spec:goos.AuctionSniperEndToEndTest]/[test:sniper joins auction, loses without bidding] display-name: sniper joins auction, loses without bidding

testcase.name: sniper joins auction, bids and loses
testcase.system-out: unique-id: [engine:kotest]/[spec:goos.AuctionSniperEndToEndTest]/[test:sniper joins auction, bids and loses] display-name: sniper joins auction, bids and loses

testcase.name: sniper wins an auction by bidding higher
testcase.system-out: unique-id: [engine:kotest]/[spec:goos.AuctionSniperEndToEndTest]/[test:sniper wins an auction by bidding higher] display-name: sniper wins an auction by bidding higher

testcase.name: sniper loses an auction after bidding
testcase.system-out: unique-id: [engine:kotest]/[spec:goos.AuctionSniperEndToEndTest]/[test:sniper loses an auction after bidding] display-name: sniper loses an auction after bidding

testcase.name: sniper bids for multiple items
testcase.system-out: unique-id: [engine:kotest]/[spec:goos.AuctionSniperEndToEndTest]/[test:sniper bids for multiple items] display-name: sniper bids for multiple items

testcase.name: sniper loses an auction when the price is too high
testcase.system-out: unique-id: [engine:kotest]/[spec:goos.AuctionSniperEndToEndTest]/[test:sniper loses an auction when the price is too high] display-name: sniper loses an auction when the price is too high

testcase.name: sniper reports invalid auction message and stops responding to events
testcase.system-out: unique-id: [engine:kotest]/[spec:goos.AuctionSniperEndToEndTest]/[test:sniper reports invalid auction message and stops responding to events] display-name: sniper reports invalid auction message and stops responding to events
